type.description:
## Riding

---



[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/riding)

Checks if the actor entity is currently riding the target entity.

Type ID: `origins:riding`




---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:riding"
}
```
